quotes.text: In the mystical realm of testing, the Debug Paladin stands between ergonomic harmony and documentation destruction.
quotes.author: Oracle of Generated Wisdom

quotes.text: Architecture design is not wasted time; it's art of foresight. Like nurturing growth, but for collaboration.
quotes.author: Refactoring Monk

quotes.text: In the mystical realm of deployment, the Comfort Sentinel stands between comfortable development and runtime catastrophe.
quotes.author: Oracle of Generated Wisdom
